meanings.definition: A Greek dish consisting of spinach and feta cheese baked in phyllo pastry.
meanings.sent1: I tried a delicious spanakopitas at the Greek restaurant.
meanings.sent2: My mom makes the best spanakopitas for family gatherings.
meanings.sent3: The spanakopitas at the party disappeared in seconds!
meanings.sent4: Her cooking skills are like magic; she turns spinach and feta into spanakopitas.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked spanakopitas filled the kitchen.

meanings.sent1: We ordered two plates of spanakopitas for the table.
meanings.sent2: The spanakopitas were a hit at the potluck dinner.
meanings.sent3: The fridge is full of leftover spanakopitas from the party.
meanings.sent4: The spanakopitas on the buffet table beckoned to the guests.
meanings.sent5: The caterer prepared a mountain of spanakopitas for the event.
